description:
Zipper
In the course of practicing BDSM on a daily basis, one learns that certain activities have a much higher chance of going horribly, horribly wrong during a shoot than others. Inevitably these are also the same activities, when pulled off successfully, make a shoot completely amazing to watch. So the ever present question when working with a model is, do you aim for the moon and risk the whole shoot crashing and burning, or do you play it safe and be reasonably assured of getting some usable, albeit probably less than stellar content?For this shoot, I decided to screw caution and go full speed ahead and the gamble paid off. We did an intense asphyxiation play scene with a latex breath restriction hood and even though she was scared at first, Jandi soon became comfortable, followed by wildly turned on, which led to an explosion of orgasmic bliss which you need to view to fully comprehend.
title: Zipper
